tooltip: Select Empress Nabooru, Sage of Spirits, as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Nabooru focuses on hiding her units.
Allows you to summon Nabooru, a swift hero with long reaching attacks.
A stealthed Melee unit that can steal resources from enemies.
Marauders and Glaive Grunts automatically gain Camouflage.
The Dodge rating and Movement Speed of all Infantry is improved.
